text: Emblem of the Russian Air Force This is a list of military aircraft currently in service with the Russian Air Force. ==Aircraft== ===Current inventory=== A Russian Air Force Su-34 A Russian Air Force Su-35S Victory Day Parade A Beriev A-50 in flight A Tu-214R taking off from Borisoglebskoye Airfield An Il-78M of the 203rd Guards Air Refuelling Regiment An An-124-100 accompanied by a Su-27UB A Russian Air Force Ka-52 in flight Farnborough International Airshow {| class="wikitable" !
